item.description: Paul, who puts on this dance, has his own meetup group, SuperSingles(TM), where this is also listed. 8:00 pm - 12:00 am ( $12. before 9pm, $15. after 9pm) If I can have 10 of us from my meetup group event listings sign up for this ahead of time I can send Paul a list of names to get you a $10 admission. I am listing this with other groups. Free Dance Lesson @ 7:30pm, Top DJ Dance Music, Complimentary Hor D'ouevres, Raffle, Door Prizes and Cash Bar . There were good turn-outs for the dances here in previous months.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the meetup signs and ask for Neil

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: SuperSingles Dance
